title: Freaky Friday: Episode 30
description:
Ghost Horses; Bernie the Boogeyman, or How I Re-Learned to Love Potpies; I exist in a dream world, and sleep paralysis is no joke; Accidental international drug smuggler; Pranked by my house ghost?...or home invasion?; and Glitch in the matrix, or message from another world?

Head to sinisterhood.com/freakyfriday to submit your odd but true story
Head to sinisterhood.com/liveshows to purchase tickets for our October 27th live show
